ComicInfo.Summary:
*Pure Sacrifice (3 of 4)* *Bungle In The Jungle* ...
*The Dying Game (3 of 4)* *Take A Card Any Card* ...
*Dangerous Games (3 of 4)* *Hunter's Prey* ...
*Hung Jury (3 of 3)* Knight takes on Chainsaw and ensures the Pretorian's true day in court.
